Package langModel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LanguageModel
    Interface LanguageModel: interface to describe a language model.
    NgramCounts
    Interface NgramCounts: interface to build the counts of n-grams from a training corpus (to be used by a language model).
    Vocabulary
    Interface Vocabulary: interface to represent the vocabulary associated to a language model (it can be made of words or characters).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MiscUtil
    Class MiscUtil: class containing miscellaneous functions to deal with files and directories.
    MyLaplaceLanguageModel
    Class MyLaplaceLanguageModel: class inheriting the class MyNaiveLanguageModel by creating a n-gram language model using a Laplace smoothing.
    MyNaiveLanguageModel
    Class MyNaiveLanguageModel: class implementing the interface LanguageModel by creating a naive language model, i.e. a n-gram language model with no smoothing.
    MyNgramCounts
    Class MyNgramCounts: class implementing the interface NgramCounts.
    MyVocabulary
    Class MyVocabulary: class implementing the interface Vocabulary.
    NgramUtil
    Class NgramUtil: class containing useful functions to deal with n-grams.
